snippet.title: Enterchained Trailer
snippet.description:
Enterchained has been announced as a finalist for the lalaninja road to pax, you can can help us win a booth at PAXAus by giving it a go on the Windows 8 Store here: 

http://apps.microsoft.com/windows/en-au/app/b306cb00-cf9a-45ad-86b0-3297cc17df65 

Thanks, 
Enterchained Team

In Enterchained you and your teammate are chained together and must work together to take down waves of different enemies; we like to think of it as the synchronised swimming of the gladiatorial arena. Slash at your enemies, throw your weapon or use the chain to trip numerous foes; but make sure you coordinate your actions or you will end up shouting at your teammate for dragging you unarmed away from your dropped weapon or tripping you over in the middle of a group of foes.

As you master this graceful dance of death you will unlock powerful items which dramatically alter your play styles and (hopefully) turn you into the greatest gladiatorial team that ever existed.
